text: And one other Q, if I have an array of plots, and want to then plot(array…), how can I title this “meta plot” without just titling all the subplots?

elements.text: And one other Q, if I have an array of plots, and want to then plot(array…), how can I title this “meta plot” without just titling all the subplots?

text:
AFAIK there is no “super title”- in the docs it says its just not yet implemented. IDK what people do to work around this
<https://docs.juliaplots.org/latest/generated/attributes_plot/> (`plot_title` kwarg)

elements.text: AFAIK there is no “super title”- in the docs it says its just not yet implemented. IDK what people do to work around this

text: Ah right, that is a shame, will have to work around that for now then
